text: Veli Veikko Valtteri Lehtelä (6 September 1935 - 3 June 2020) was a Finnish rower. He competed in various two-man and four man events at the 1956, 1960 and 1964 Olympics and won two bronze medals, in 1956 and 1960. He was born in Sääksmäki, Finland.Veli Lehtelä. sports-reference.com Lehtelä died on 3 June 2020 in Helsinki, aged 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Finland Category:Rowers
title: Veli Lehtelä
